scripts.dev-compile:css: sass public/src/scss/:public/src/css/ --style expanded --watch | postcss --use autoprefixer -b 'last 10 versions' public/src/css/*.css --dir public/src/css/ -w
scripts.pro-compile:css: sass public/src/scss/:public/src/css/ --style compressed | postcss --use autoprefixer -b 'last 10 versions' public/src/css/*.css -dir public/src/css/
